name: Escape Legacy - SideQuest
description:
NOTE : GAME WILL BE ON PERMANENT 50% DISCOUNT. HAVE FUN!

<<<REQUIRES OCULUS QUEST>>>

* For more information about sideloading, please visit : https://sidequestvr.com/

You Play as Erica who follows the adventurous steps of her grandfather. Find all Ancient Scrolls while you trying to make your way to the escape door.

Solve series of Puzzles and riddles! Explore numerous rooms and locations, find hidden items,clues and escape before time runs out! Play with a new fresh type of Realistic Gameplay for escape rooms!

Forget about Old casual escape room or point and click games... BE IN THE ROOM! Begin your Adventure today and make your True Escape!

FEATURES

- Amazing High Detailed Graphics
- Puzzles and Items Change Every Time you Play
- 10 Levels with 80+ Rooms to explore
- Over 10 Hours of Gameplay
- Challenging Puzzles
- Thrilling Music and Sound Effects
- Player Interactive Gaming Enviroment
- Intelligent Inventory System
- Unique Scoring system with Global Scoreboards


*Please Note that a network connection is also required for submitting your scores.
*Game Progress is stored Localy, please backup before uninstalling.


Thank you for choosing to Play Escape Legacy!

Some Quick Notes for Players

- Randomized Puzzles and Items : each time you start a level all puzzles and items are auto generated,  so don't expect to use the same ones each time you play. This will provide some kind of replayability.

- Interactions are done with either pressing Trigger which uses VR Hand position or 
  by holding the Grip and Point with Laser to the object and pressing Trigger
- Laser Colors : 
  A. Red : means you aren't able to interact with the object yet
  B. Yellow : means you are too far from the object to interact
  C. Green : interaction is possible

*There are some rare cases where laser interaction wont be possible, you may want
 to step away from the object and try again pointing on it.

- UI ONLY INTERACTIONS : some objects, like Electronic Passwords or Locks may be interacted  only with the use of Laser Pointer (Hold Grip)

- Inventory : You may check and inspect items you have collected. The usage of items is
  done automatically, also when an item is used it will be removed from inventory.

- Difficulties : Playing on Easy will not result in a loss, even if time runs out. However
  on Normal/Hard you have less time and when time runs out it will result in a loss. Playing  on higher levels will provide bigger score bonuses.

- Saving : Progress is saved ONLY when you Complete a level. This will Unlock next Level and  current level's difficulty. 

- Gems : gems will provide (depending on color) score bonuses, thus this item is auto-consumed  and it will not appear on inventory.

- Statues : same as gems but this time they provide extra Time.

- Papers/Letters : some papers can be collected, but other will not. Also you may notice that when  you complete a puzzle some papers will dissapear, this is normal as they are no longer needed.

That's All! Enjoy!
